item.title: createApp
item.description: createApp 一个简单的计数器例子 创建渲染器 挂载 App 上下文 // apiCreateApp.ts export function createAppContext(): AppContext { return { app: null as any, config: { isNativeTag: NO, performance: false, globalProperties: {}, optionMergeStrategies: {}, isCustomElement: NO, errorHandler: undefined, warnHandler: undefined }, mixins: [], components: {}, directives: {}, provides: Object.create(null) } }
